iris.pipelines.data_engineering package¶

Example code for the nodes in the example pipeline. This code is meant just for illustrating basic Kedro features.

PLEASE DELETE THIS FILE ONCE YOU START WORKING ON YOUR OWN PROJECT!

Submodules¶

iris.pipelines.data_engineering.nodes module¶

iris.pipelines.data_engineering.nodes.encode_categorical_columns(data, target_col)[source]¶

Node for encoding the categorical columns in the Iris data set.

Return type

DataFrame

iris.pipelines.data_engineering.nodes.get_classes(data, target_col)[source]¶

Node for getting the classes from the Iris data set.

Return type

List[str]

iris.pipelines.data_engineering.nodes.split_data(data, test_data_ratio, classes)[source]¶

Node for splitting the classical Iris data set into training and test sets, each split into features and labels.

Return type

Dict[str, Any]
